effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder takes damage directly from a move and does not faint, it switches out for another random, non-fainted Pokémon in its party.
This effect does not activate if another effect prevents the holder from switching out.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: When the holder takes damage from a move, the opponent switches out for another random party Pokémon. Consumed after use.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder is hit by an attack, the attacker is removed from battle.
